games.summary: Jaylen Brown had 29 points while Payton Pritchard scored 24 points to help the Boston Celtics make their biggest comeback of the season, rallying from a 22-point deficit to defeat the Miami Heat 98-96 on Friday night. Nikola Vucevic had a double-double in his first game with the Celtics, finishing with 11 points and 12 rebounds.
blurbs: 📋 Luka Garza (BOS) made just his 3rd start this season. 2 pts, 3 reb.

games.summary: Daniss Jenkins scored 18 points in his last game as a two-way player and the Detroit Pistons routed New York 118-80 on Friday night to end the Knicks' winning streak at eight games. Tobias Harris and Isaiah Stewart each scored 15 points for the Pistons.
blurbs: ⬆️ Paul Reed (DET) played 27 min (season avg: 12). 12 pts, 6 reb, 4 ast.
⬆️ Mohamed Diawara (NY) played 21 min (season avg: 6). 4 pts, 2 reb, 0 ast.
⬆️ Ariel Hukporti (NY) played 22 min (season avg: 9). 6 pts, 7 reb, 1 ast.
⬆️ Kevin McCullar Jr. (NY) played 20 min (season avg: 8). 2 pts, 2 reb, 2 ast.

games.summary: Kevin Porter Jr . had 23 points, eight assists and seven rebounds and the Milwaukee Bucks beat the Indiana Pacers 105-99 on Friday night for their first three-game winning streak of the season.
blurbs: 📋 Jericho Sims (MIL) made just his 5th start this season. 4 pts, 15 reb.
⬆️ Johnny Furphy (IND) played 31 min (season avg: 18). 2 pts, 8 reb, 3 ast.

games.summary: Saddiq Bay scored 30 points, including two free throws with 10.8 seconds remaining, helping the New Orleans Pelicans overcome an 18-point second-half deficit in a 119-115 win over the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday night.
blurbs: ⬆️ Bones Hyland (MIN) played 30 min (season avg: 15). 20 pts, 3 reb, 2 ast.

games.summary: Jerami Grant had 23 points and the Portland Trail Blazers snapped a six-game losing streak, beating the Memphis Grizzlies 135-115 on Friday night to open a two-game set. Jrue Holiday had 20 points and seven assists for the Blazers, who led by 30 points after pulling away in the second half.
blurbs: 🆕 Olivier-Maxence Prosper (MEM) made his first start of the season. 28 min, 13 pts.
📋 GG Jackson (MEM) made just his 5th start this season. 15 pts, 3 reb.

games.summary: SACRAMENTO, Calif. -- — Kawhi Leonard scored 31 points, grabbed nine rebounds and had seven assists to lead the Los Angeles Clippers to a 114-111 victory over Sacramento on Friday night, sending the Kings to their 11th straight loss.
blurbs: ⬆️ Dylan Cardwell (SAC) played 31 min (season avg: 20). 14 pts, 14 reb, 1 ast.
⬆️ Devin Carter (SAC) played 22 min (season avg: 10). 14 pts, 4 reb, 4 ast.
⬆️ Nique Clifford (SAC) played 33 min (season avg: 20). 16 pts, 2 reb, 2 ast.
⬆️ Brook Lopez (LAC) played 36 min (season avg: 17). 15 pts, 9 reb, 2 ast.
